markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Twinned Defense (Swashbuckler)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1553) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Twin Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=377)

**Requirements**
You wield two melee weapons, one in each hand.

</column>

---

You're always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you. While you are in this stance, you constantly gain the benefits of the [Twin Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=377) action.
name: Twinned Defense (Swashbuckler)
requirement: You wield two melee weapons, one in each hand.
requirement_markdown: You wield two melee weapons, one in each hand.

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 14" pfs="Standard" > Twinned Defense (Swashbuckler) Single Action Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 93 2.0 Prerequisites Twin Parry Requirements You wield two melee weapons, one in each hand. --- You're always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you.
